channel.title: Second Brain on Facile.it Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Second Brain on Facile.it Engineering

item.title: Venerdì Protetto | October edition
item.description: This page contains the abstracts of the talks held during the latest Venerdì Protetto on October 13, 2023. Topics: Machine learning by Marica Castaldo & Santolo Tubelli OpenTelemetry by Stefano Giurgiano Second Brain by Antonello Calamea (freelance) The overview of Venerdì Protetto is available here. Machine learning Machine learning pipelines at Facile.it: real-rime use case for mortgages by Marica Castaldo & Santolo Tubelli In this talk, we presented a real-time machine learning use case within the mortgage industry.
